create table #categories(cgnbr nvarchar(64)) insert into #categories (cgnbr) values ('personal_care'), ('pho_vid_acc_obj'), ('bicycle_accessories'), ('bicycle_others'), ('videocameras'), ('cellphones'), ('clocks_luksus'), ('childrenacc')
create table #pids(id int, cgId int, seq real) create table #vids(id int)
insert into #pids(id, cgId, seq) select p.ProductID, cgp.CPCGNBR, cgp.CPSEQNBR from CGPRREL cgp join Product p on cgp.CPPRNBR = p.ProductID join Product v on p.ProductID = v.ParentProduct join CATEGORY c on cgp.CPCGNBR = c.CGRFNBR join #categories cToLeave on c.CGNBR = cToLeave.cgnbr collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS where p.Published in (1,3) and v.Published in (1,3) and c.CGPUB = 1
insert into #vids(id) select v.ProductID from CGPRREL cgp join Product p on cgp.CPPRNBR = p.ProductID join Product v on p.ProductID = v.ParentProduct join CATEGORY c on cgp.CPCGNBR = c.CGRFNBR join #categories cToLeave on c.CGNBR = cToLeave.cgnbr collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS where p.Published in (1,3) and v.Published in (1,3) and c.CGPUB = 1
truncate table CGPRREL
insert into CGPRREL(CPCGNBR, CPPRNBR, CPSEQNBR) select pids.cgId, pids.id, pids.seq from #pids pids
drop table #categories drop table #pids drop table #vids
